item.title: A message from Guidance:
item.description: Students still working on their 40 volunteer hours are encouraged to check the school website for approved opportunities or speak with a Guidance Counsellor for help getting started.

item.title: A message from Mme Perron:
item.description: A message for all Europe trip participants to please return all money collected for the gift card fundraiser to Mme Perron by Wednesday, January 7th. Students are also reminded to start prepping for our value village fundraiser by reminding those with gently used clothing items and household goods to bring in by January 30th. Also a reminder that sign up is open for the fundraising table/coat check at the Living Locally Fair on Saturday January 17th. There will be a team meeting on Wednesday January 7th in room 125 at lunch.

item.title: A message from Mme Bourdon:
item.description: To all ski and snowboard participants. This is a reminder that ski/snowboard equipment can't be brought to school on the bus. Equipment can be dropped off by parents at any time prior to Thursday morning.
